author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: lightweight swagger-ui crud-middleware backed by mongodb
name: swagger-lite

scripts.build-doc: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shDocApiCreate "{ exampleFileList:['example.js','test.js','index.js'], moduleDict:{'swagger-lite':{aliasList:['swmg'],exports:require('./index.js')}} }"
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && node_modules/.bin/utility2 test test.js
